content.rendered:
Orchestra Club – Grade 5

Orchestra club gives students the opportunity to spend more time with their instrument making music and experiencing additional performance opportunities. Throughout the year, we play at events in school and at places in the community. It is currently open to 5th graders but adds 4th graders by audition as they are ready for the extra musical challenge.

Robotics Club – Grades 4-5

The Greenfield Robotics Club is a group of twenty 4th and 5th grade student engineers, that work collaboratively to design and build robots using the Vex IQ Robotics Curriculum. Our goal is to create a robot that can move and lift obstacles. We work on robots that will be ready to compete in a robotics challenge. We also showcase our work at the annual Greenfield Science Fair.

Safety Patrol – Grades 4-5

Safety Patrol club organizes students to be “on duty” in the hallways during arrival and dismissal times to help ensure that students are walking and being safe. We hand out Dragon Dollars to students who are walking and help set up cones in the gym hallway to organize the flow of “traffic.”

Sports Club – Grades 3-5

We have a sports club called “Just Run.” This is a morning club that meets twice a week for 3rd, 4th, and 5th graders. The purpose of Just Run is to provide an organized, safe, and positive setting while increasing a student’s physical activity.

Student Council – Grades 4-5

(pending advisor commitment)

Student Council is a group of 4th and 5th graders who have volunteered to be leaders in our school. They are elected by their peers and are role models for our school. Student Council works on many projects throughout the year to help make our school and community a better place.
